entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-10
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2022-34716: .NET Information Disclosure Vulnerability #232

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Generic attributes lack testing #73735
  • jit\\regression\\jitblue\\runtime_60035\\runtime_60035\\runtime_60035.cmd #73728
  • Reenable MSQuic subscription into main after .NET 7 fork #73726
    8.0.0
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.ComponentModel #73724
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] ArgumentNullException.ParamName is missing #73723
    8.0.0
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Data #73722
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Some IO tests failing on Windows/NodeJS #73721
    7.0.0
  • illegal read of byte preceding an automatic (stack allocate) variable #73718
  • Issue using `dotnet trace` on MacCatalyst apps #73715
  • Share serialization tests between source-gen and reflection JsonSerializer #73714
    8.0.0
  • Consider failing early when (de)serializing enum values that contain commas #73712
    8.0.0
  • Building clr shouldn't build host tests #73711
  • Can't get assembly probing to work; not sure why. #73710
  • [API Proposal]: Add a property or method that can be used to check if there is an error in the process #73709
  • PerformanceCounters do not support config entry for 'filemappingsize' #73706
  • System.Net.WebProxy Bypass regex list reconstructed for every call to IsBypassed #73703
    Future
  • NativeAOT test ` ThreadLocalStatics.TLSTesting.ThreadLocalStatics_Test` failing on OSX/x64 #73698
  • [NativeAOT] Randomizing guard stack cookie not supported on some Unix platforms #73695
  • Assert: JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\GitHub_27924\\GitHub_27924\\GitHub_27924.cmd - slot_table[slot_index] == nullptr #73692
    7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Consider implementing send buffering on .NET side #73691
    8.0.0
  • Bug in the .NET Blog https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/ #73690
  • [QUIC] Abort on cancellation throws QUIC_STATUS_INVALID_PARAMETER #73688
  • Repoint URL's to docs from corefx to runtime repo #73682
  • Unnecessary(?) runtime lookups for constrained interface calls #73681
    7.0.0
  • `slot_table[slot_index] == nullptr` - dynamic atexit destructor for 'WKS::gc_heap::mark_queue #73679
    7.0.0
  • Improve experience when using PublishAot with unsupported RID #73678
    7.0.0
  • HttpListener Stack over flow #73674
  • [wasm] Regression: Crash on running debugger tests on Codespaces #73673
    7.0.0
  • Accessing physical drives throws when accessing from the end and retrieving .Length #73669
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Regressions in System.ConsoleTests.Perf_Console and Perf_BitOperations #67598
    7.0.0
  • Out of memory exception in JIT/Regression/JitBlue/DevDiv_255294 #8034
    Future
  • [RyuJit/R2R/JitStress=1] JIT\Regression\JitBlue\DevDiv_255294 fails with timeout. #9810
    Future
  • stop runtime maestro from consuming dotnet/msquic #73645
    7.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.TraceSource doesn't read configuration from App.config in .NET Core? #23937
    7.0.0
  • Freeze/lock of dotnet process in net 5 mac #60252
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Numerics.Tests.BigIntegerConstructorTest.RunCtorSingleTests #70761
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexMatchTests.Match #70645
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: support System.Diagnostics.TraceSource to be initialized from the app.config file. #72967
    7.0.0
  • `Internal CLR error. (0x80131506)` in `System.Reflection.InvokeInterpreted.Tests` on `coreclr windows x64 Release` #73453
  • Add libclang to Microsoft.NETCore.Runtime.Mono.LLVM.Sdk package #62485
    7.0.0
  • Polymorphic Serialization - Doesn't allow typeDiscriminator to be anything but first #73693
  • Inconsistent stack trace with .NET 7 preview 5 #70940
    7.0.0
  • System.Threading.Tasks.Parallel.Tests fails on Android #50566
    7.0.0
  • Test failure GC\\Scenarios\\FinalizeTimeout\\FinalizeTimeout\\FinalizeTimeout.cmd #73668
  • `Console.ReadKey` returns incomplete VT sequences for bracketed paste #60101
    7.0.0
  • From issue #65696. #73635
  • Assertion failed '(emitThisGCrefRegs & regMask) == 0' during 'Emit code' (IL size 129) #65311
    7.0.0
  • ThreadPoolCanPickUpOneOrMoreWorkItemsWhenThreadIsAvailable test failure on Android #43754
    7.0.0
  • Consider making Visual Studio's CMake integration work with CMake projects within the repo #40049
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\jit64\\opt\\cse\\hugeSimpleExpr1\\hugeSimpleExpr1.cmd #73545
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Security.Tests.CertificateValidationRemoteServer.ConnectWithRevocation_StapledOcsp(offlineContext: False) #71037
    7.0.0
  • Each nativefilereference causes 512+mb to be allocated #62736
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Review generated js binding code urls #71727
    7.0.0
  • React to ref escape changes in interpolated string handlers #73642
    7.0.0
  • [QUIC] CONNECTION_TIMEOUT may be misreported as IDLE_TIMEOUT #73229
    7.0.0
  • System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.Tests failure on win-arm64 with ArgumentOutOfRangeException #72364
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Random Application Hangs at Task.Run #73590
  • Possible SerialPort memory leak on Raspbian (all Unix?) #55146
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Tests.Vectors.Vector64Tests.Vector64Int64SumTest #73667
  • area-ILTools-coreclr ilasm.exe failing - Failed to add user string using DefineUserString, hr=0x80131198, data: 'presence' #73656
  • NativeAOT compiler crash with NRE #70952
    7.0.0
  • Tar crashes on reading the specific file #73440
    Future
  • Test faliure GC\\API\\Frozen\\Frozen\\Frozen.cmd #73672
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.EnvironmentVariables 6.0.1 fails reading environment variables #73570
    6.0.x
  • Change the `cpu-usage` EventCounter from int to double #62525
    7.0.0
  • crash in the application #70886
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix component model aot test #73734
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update all of the net 6 packs to be labeled .net6 #73733
  • Disable gcstress on osx-x64 #73732
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Bring back readability lost in .Net 6, and stop emitting BOM. #73731
    area-Serialization, 7.0.0
  • Implement IXmlTextWriterInitializer on the async writer wrapper. #73730
    area-Serialization, 7.0.0
  • 66163 fatal error xml serializer immutable array #73729
    area-Serialization, 7.0.0
  • consume Debian images with updated msquic #73727
    area-System.Net.Quic, 7.0.0
  • Move the XML comments from reference assembly to CoreCLR implementation #73725
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Ensure partial Vector256 acceleration is still possible on AVX only hardware #73720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: extend forward sub to local fields #73719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Properly encode small structs in bitcasts #73717
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [libs] Remove JitInfoIsPopulated mobile activeissue #73716
    area-System.Runtime, os-android, os-ios, os-tvos
  • consume MsQuic 2.1 for windows ARM64 builds #73713
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Handle Stream.Length for devices #73708
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • consume fedora images with msquic updated to 2.1 #73707
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Generic attributes handling in CustomAttributeDecoder #73705
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [wasm] fix error cases in assets loading #73702
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Use asset loading for dotnet.worker.js; update WasmAppBuilder #73697
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Vectorize IndexOfAnyExcept for four values #73696
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Don't inflate Mono.ValueTuple with byrefs #73689
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix NRT annotations for XmlProcessingInstruction #73687
    area-System.Xml, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove executable bits from generated shared libs #73686
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • #51393 removed activeissue from not supported platforms #73684
    area-System.IO, needs-author-action
  • Don't excessively generate default constructors #73683
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [HTTP3] Correctly handle server closing a control stream #73680
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Remove [RequiresPreviewFeatures] from System.Security.Cryptography.Cose #73677
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Obsolete XmlSecureResolver #73676
    Security, area-System.Xml, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Copy default value back when Missing.Value is provided as argument #73670
    area-System.Reflection

Merged

  • Handle the case when pid replacement is not needed #73664
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [MONO] Move marshal-ilgen into a component #71203
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Android] Disable failing JIT.Directed test #73704
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support TraceSource to be initialized from the app.config file #73087
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Vectorize IndexOfAnyExcept<T>(T value) #73488
    area-System.Memory, 7.0.0
  • [Android] Enable Dop_WorkersCreatedRespectingLimitAndTaskScheduler_Sync test #73486
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • Remove unused thumb2_supported variable in mini-arm.c #73701
  • Add Span.Reverse() intrinsic for Arm64 #72780
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, community-contribution, arm64, 7.0.0
  • Fix up doc comments #73597
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [Android] Enable ThreadPoolCanPickUpOneOrMoreWorkItemsWhenThreadIsAvailable test #73487
    area-System.Threading
  • try to port ASCIIUtility.NarrowUtf16ToAscii to x-plat intrinsics #73064
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • Initialize main thread to MTA by default in NativeAOT #73659
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • ILASM - Roundtrip fix for 'poison' and 'hugeSimpleExpr1' #73648
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Bump TraceEventVersion to 3.0.3 #71813
  • Use SSL_ctrl instead of SSL_CTX_ctrl to enable client OCSP stapling #73627
    area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Misc fixes #73662
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, area-Debugger-mono
  • Revert "Generic attributes handling in CustomAttributeDecoder" #73671
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Add `scoped` keyword where needed on interpolated string handlers #73665
    area-Meta
  • Enable JitDisasm in Release #73365
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Update dotnet/msquic ref to release/7.0 #73641
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add Directory.CreateTempSubdirectory #73408
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix Android x86 Debug build of pal_ifaddrs.c #73685
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [wasm] Update javascript API usage in samples and tests #73367
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Update MsQuic and use ConnectionCloseStatus in StreamShutdown #73563
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix preinit of types placing the same value in two fields #73605
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix SerialPort memory leak when requests time out and no data is received #68014
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [NativeAot] Triage another 14 libs tests #73442
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Support managed debugging when CET is enabled #73572
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Ldap search crashes on Linux when timeout specified #72676
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • changing CPU from int to double #66743
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Use JitStdOutFile for .dasm file creation #73638
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • DCS alignment to 4.8 with schema support #71752
    area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Expand NativeAOT testing platforms #73546
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ensure BitIncrement/BitDecrement for Half works correctly #73631
    area-System.Numerics
  • Utilize Kernel Samepage Merging #71312
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, Future
  • Remove non-determinism from R2R field access #73663
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Port Windows/MSDTC distributed transactions support #72051
    area-System.Transactions
  • Clean up AOT publish process #73416
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable inlining P/Invokes into try blocks with no catch or filter clauses V2 #73661
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Add logging callback to DAC EnumMemoryRegion API #73599
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • shortcut string replace if oldvalue is longer than count #73543
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution, Future
  • Initialize variable prior to pedantic use. Caught by ubsan on a bool. #73626
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add support for the Aho-Corasick algorithm in regexes. #71588
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Use `GetTempPath2W` if available. #72452
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Issue71025 test #72154
    area-System.Transactions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
  • Remove [Serializable] from OptionException #73316
    arch-wasm, area-Host, 7.0.0
  • Add markdown readme for System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager #72772
    area-System.Configuration, community-contribution
  • COSE: Add documentation and exception correction #73394
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Get rid of more .NET Nativisms #73612
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add tests and improve binary XmlDictionaryReader performance #73332
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Improve XmlDictionaryWriter UTF8 encoding performance #73336
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Add method parameter names to stack trace if available #73578
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on Node.js #68807
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • WIP: Verify correctness of using mono llvmfullaot with interpreter as a fallback instead of GSHAREDVTs #72443
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • fix a couple issues with Microsoft.XmlSerailizer.Generator #73550
    area-Serialization
  • Honor naming policy for string enum deserialization #73348
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Breakpoint set in a invalid line, set it to the next available line #73189
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add non-generic Create method to DispatchProxy #73046
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution, Future
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • To keep ubsan happy, Use offsetof() rather than legacy equivalent #73657
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Tar: restore directory permissions while extracting. #72078
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Improve Interop.Sys.ReadLink error handling #72258
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Account for availability of multiple processor groups on Windows 11+ #68639
    area-System.Threading
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update Maui builds to use dotnet rc1 and new dotnet version flow #73624
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix #70391 #73654
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-linux, os-mac-os-x, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • [debugger] First draft of managed debugger on wasi #67272
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Port IndexOfAny(ref char, char[1-5], int) to Vector128/256 #73469
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Gradual decommit in wks #73620
    area-GC-coreclr
  • port SpanHelpers.IndexOfAny(ref byte, byte, byte, byte, int) to Vector128/256 #73481
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Unix: Move 'FileNotFound to DirectoryNotFound' handling to GetExceptionForIoErrno. #70661
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [Android] gRPC client tests #73060
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][jit] box+callvirt optimization #73456
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Port SpanHelpers.SequenceCompareTo(ref byte, int, ref byte, int) to Vector128/256 #73475
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • port SpanHelpers.IndexOfAny(ref byte, byte, byte, int) to Vector128/256 #73556
    area-System.Memory, 7.0.0
  • X509Certificates.Tests: make tests pass when rsa+sha1 signing is not supported. #70821
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [Ppc64le] Added memory patch thunking for function calls #73616
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution, arch-ppc64le
  • [wasm] Unmanaged structs are considered blittable if module has `DisableRuntimeMarshallingAttribute` #73310
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] crypto deadlock fix #73537
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Throw invalid program if stack state is invalid #73215
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Experiment light self contained test runner(no reflection/tcp stack) #71305
    community-contribution
  • [wasm] Log as warning in interop generator when method signature is not supported #71477
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Changes to bring templates into SDK introduces source-build prebuilts #27089
  • [Ubuntu 22.04] dotnet doesn't find installed SDKs #27082
  • Failure to publish WASM when project source path contains blank spaces - Reopened from #26061 #27073
  • PublishRelease with t:\publish, solutions, and Publishing as Release by Default #27066
    7.0.2xx

Closed

  • Workload install always fail #27075
  • dotnet pack wrong path on DotNetCoreCLI@2 [Azure DevOps] #27080

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove SystemInformation dependency #27090
    Area-Workloads
  • Adding support for VS Designtime targets for worker projects #27087
    Area-WebSDK
  • Parser for actual msbuild property syntax #27086
    Bug, Area-CLI
  • [Templates] marked template packages as shipping #27083
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #27072
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #27071
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1923733 #26992
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.3xx #27054
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support left and right names for assembly set #27024
    Area-ApiCompat
  • [Blazor] Handle _GlobalPropertiesToRemoveFromProjectReferences in the SDK #27057
    Area-AspNetCore, 7.0.1xx
  • Removed own implementation of Reporter in `TemplateEngine.Cli` #27021
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #27062
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Get PublishRelease and PackRelease working in .*proj #26808
    Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.1xx
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1935418 #27043
    Area-Infrastructure
  • `dotnet-new`: dotnet post-actions are moved to `dotnet` project #27039
  • [dotnet new] telemetry for MSBuild evaluation #27042
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add rule for detecting attribute differences #26891
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Fix for --print-download-link only #27064
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix dotnet test --blame parameters to validate incoming values, and update help #26963
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Removing default ProduceReferenceAssembly value for F# #26306
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Should `required` on a property force it to be nullable in the constructor always #6359

Closed

  • Decorator pattern for functions in .NET #6358

PullRequests

Merged

  • Correct sample code for explicit implementation #6361

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider using 'TemporaryArray' for argument arrays in method invocation escape analysis #63319
  • Roslyn crashes during source generation when using new `ForAttributeWithMetadataName` API #63318
  • Last 13 characters of error output in 'C# Interactive' window are not colored red #63317
  • Is it possible for a [Generator] to add attributes to a property / field / method / property? #63316
  • `CSharpExtractClassCodeRefactoringProvider` throws exception when type members are contained directly in namespace #63315
  • 'Invert if' mishandles lifted relational operators #63311
  • Split Comment option in VS Tools->Options is mistakenly bound to Split String option #63309
  • Exception in `CSharpAddParameterCheckCodeRefactoringProvider` when changing type of indexer argument #63307
  • Escape analysis ignores local passed by reference to interpolated string handler `AppendFormatted()` method #63306
    17.4
  • Primary constructor (properties) have sequence points but breakpoints can't be placed #63299

Closed

  • IntelliSense suggests the "String" class, not the "string" keyword #62079
    17.4
  • Source Generators does not work with multitarget dependencies #62148
  • TargetFramework net6.0 and LangVersion default shouled be C# 10 #63303
  • SourceProductionContext and GeneratorExecutionContext should share a common interface for AddSource() #62439
    C# 12.0

PullRequests

Created

  • ConvertToRecord: Property and Method analysis #63320
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Remove GenerateSdkPackages #63314
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.4-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #63312
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Track MemberNotNull for local functions #63310
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • draft #63305
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add return types to SymbolKey creation and resolution #63304
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.3-vs-deps to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #63301
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Backport some integration test skips to 17.3 #63300
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Semantic Snippets - Fix how snippets appear in the completion list #63277
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63313
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Resolve nuget warnings #63298
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Always use filter text to select between keyword and type item for special types #63296
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63302
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove prefer system hash code from EditorConfig UI #62939
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #63283
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63250
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.3-vs-deps #63279
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix key for VisualFSharp.UnitTests IVT #63297
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63321
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • correctness build optimizations #62797
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Completion for .editorconfig files #63019
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Update method invocation escape analysis to match spec changes #62886
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Integrate Lambda Default Parameters into Synthesized Delegate Types and Lowering Pass #63293
    Area-Compilers
  • Use the correct option for splitting comments #62680
    Area-IDE, Community
  • First Draft of Common Language Server Protocol Framework (CLaSP) #62924
    Area-IDE
  • Create CLaSP Framework surface area #63149
    Area-IDE
  • Remove the single-symbol assumption in ConflictResolver Session #63150
    Area-IDE
  • Fixes EnC slot mapping for certain kinds of synthesized variables lifted to state machine fields #63295
    Area-Compilers
  • Emit MetadataUpdateOriginalTypeAttribute in VB #63194
    Area-Compilers
  • Hovering in .editorconfig files #63188
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Semantic snippets - foreach snippet #63058
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for incremental analysis for method body editing scenario… #63130
    Area-Analyzers
  • Use net7.0 in source-build #62916
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Restore nullable warnings for unset required members from base types #63286
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Move couple of tests to new testing library #63055
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #63282
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: json, json_netty, plaintext_nodejs #43197
  • `bind:after` with asynchronous method causes multiple renders when done. #43195
  • Update Blazor WebAssembly template to include comment linking to doc about enabling cross-origin isolation #43194
    7.0-rc1
  • Full chain support followup #43193
    7.0-rc2
  • Allow non-attribute routing for ApiController #43192
  • <base href="/" /> or base-tag alternative for Blazor MVC integration. #43191
  • Cannot add `scoped` AuthorizationHandler in .NET 7 Preview 7 #43188
  • The "ProcessFrameworkReferences" task failed unexpectedly. #43186

Closed

  • Add overload with `AuthenticationProperties` to `SignInManager.ExternalLoginSignInAsync` #43138
  • Net 6 Blazor server application::Failed to start the transport 'WebSockets': Error: WebSocket failed to connect. The connection could not be found on the server, either the endpoint may not be a SignalR endpoint, the connection ID is not present on the server, or there is a proxy blocking WebSockets. If you have multiple servers check that sticky sessions are enabled. #43175
  • OCSP Stapling support for Kestrel #4762
    7.0-rc1
  • LeakTrackingObjectPool does not report leaks because it only throws in Microsoft's own debug builds #42524
    7.0-rc1
  • Flaky Various Blazor Template timeouts/failures #30882
    7.0-rc2
  • Areas do not work in ASP.NET Core with Angular project #38354
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Problem using Microsoft.AspNetCore.ClientAssets with spaces in outputpath #38702
    .NET 7 Planning
  • For Blazor WebAssembly (hosted), consider enabling cross-origin isolation by default #42114
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Node.js processes *still* don't quit after stopping debugging #38897
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Building package.json with ClientAssets results in 404 Not Found #38898
    .NET 7 Planning
  • `browser-refresh.js` not found at `localhost` when using remote debugging #38946
    .NET 7 Planning
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_AngularFetchData_AI4W: No main landmark is defined on the "Fetch Data" page #42368
    7.0-rc1
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_AngularCounter_AI4W: No main landmark is defined on the "Counter" page #42366
    7.0-rc1
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_AngularHome_AI4W: No main landmark is defined on the "Home" page #42341
    7.0-rc1
  • [Blazor] Handle _GlobalPropertiesToRemoveFromProjectReferences in the SDK #43067
    7.0-rc1
  • System.Runtime error #43115
  • MSB4096: "StaticWebAsset" does not define a value for metadata "AssetKind" #43134
  • Missing IRouteHandlerFilter in preview 7 #43185
  • Perf improvement: https #43052
  • ApplicationBuilder.ServerFeatures nullable issue #43036
    7.0-rc1

PullRequests

Created

  • Dynamic include DataProtectionKey.Id #43204
    area-dataprotection, area-runtime
  • Add LF request line terminator option #43202
    area-runtime
  • Reduce state machine in AuthorizationMiddlewareResultHandler #43200
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Revert Dispose in IIS tests #43199
    area-runtime
  • Fixed the license value for the jquery-validation-unobtrusive repo #43196
    area-security
  • HTTP/3: Test abort at end of request #43183
    area-runtime
  • Fix MVC form data binding localization #43182
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Store Task of IAuthorizationHandler #43198
    area-security, community-contribution, 7.0-rc1
  • Update baseline, merge from internal #43173
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.36
  • Add more info to UnrecognizedMediaType #43100
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • Add comment about QueryString in more places #43179
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • Accessibility focus fixes #43177
    area-mvc, 7.0-rc1
  • ApplicationBuilder server features defaults to empty collection #43184
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • Delete StartupExceptionHandler #43153
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1

Updated

  • Cache effective policy in endpoint metadata #43124
    area-security, api-suggestion
  • Updating HttpMethodMetadata based on ICorsMetadata #43077
    area-web-frameworks
  • Sync output cache with API review #43121
    area-runtime
  • Consolidate error pages used by ANCM and improve link #43170
    area-runtime
  • Fix UsePathBase with WAB #42876
    area-runtime
  • Update SDK #43028
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Add FileDownloader service for Blazor apps #43076
    area-blazor, 7.0-rc1
  • [blazor][wasm] load .js and .wasm assets by runtime #43049
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, arch-wasm, 7.0-rc1
  • RateLimitingMiddleware updates #43053
    area-runtime, blog-candidate
  • Kestrel: Support full cert chain #41944
    area-runtime
  • [Blazor] Dynamic authentication requests #42692
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm-auth
  • Introduce per-HealthCheckRegistration parameters #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

    6.0-sr5
  • SVG Icon and Splash Problems #9322
  • MAUI on .NET 7 RC1 not buildable in Visual Studio?! #9321
  • Default value of a Preferences.Get returns a null value in Windows #9306
  • Unable to create android emulator #9304
  • Visual Studio 2022 17.4 Preview 1, Maui projects with only 1 Target do not work #9303
  • In iOS, calling .Clear() on an ObservableCollection bound to a listview causes a nullref #9302

    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Google from 6.0.7 to 6.0.8 #9311
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.JSInterop from 6.0.7 to 6.0.8 #9310
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.VisualStudio.DesignTools.Extensibility from 17.2.32505.113 to 17.3.32804.24 #9309
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Firebase.AppIndexing from 120.0.0.8 to 120.0.0.9 #9308
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk from 17.2.0 to 17.3.0 #9307

Merged

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ExecuteUpdate: Convert query with unsupported operations #28661
  • ExecuteUpdate: Add EF.Default #28660
  • JSON: add way to specify lax/strict mode for json query #28656
  • How can I override a MaxLength convention with an attribute? #28655
  • FK for generated key using TPC sometimes gets temporary value persisted to database on SaveChanges #28654
  • Query produced by global filters leads to wrong result with optional navigation #28653
  • Json/Query: translate element access of a json array #28648
    Backlog
  • Bulk operations and owned entities #28646

Closed

  • ExecuteUpdate/Delete (AKA bulk update, without loading data into memory) #795
    7.0.0
  • Cosmos: Fail in model validation for owned types that are mapped to a different collection #26538
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Clean up build configuration #28659
  • Exception message review by Shay #28657
  • Fix to #27228 - EF Core 6.0 temporal tables - Support specifying precision for PeriodEnd and PeriodStart columns #28651
  • Fix to #27155 - Average_Grouped_from_LINQ_101 is non-deterministic #28650

Merged

  • Implement ExecuteUpdate #28626
    auto-merge
  • Fix Cosmos test on CI #28658
    auto-merge
  • Bump .NET SDK from 7.0.100-preview.6.22352.1 to 7.0.100-preview.7.22377.5 #28649
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Cosmos: Fail in model validation for owned types that are mapped to a different container. #28647
  • Add IConventionEntityTypeBuilder.GetTargetEntityTypeBuilder #28637
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #28652
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • Implement stored procedure update mapping #28553
